title: P0.4: Add CI quality gates for PRs
description: Create .github/workflows/ci.yml that runs ruff, ty, and pytest on pull_request events. Fix existing lint and type errors blocking a green CI run.

contract.objective: PRs are gated by lint, type-check, and test steps
constraints: Preserve existing publish-on-tag behavior in release.yml
Use same tool versions as dev dependencies (ruff, ty, pytest)
